port.name: Port
port.description: The port, the webserver should listen to. Most Linux distributions forbid using ports lower than 1024. Since the server doesn't intend to run with root privileges a local proxy server like haproxy may be used. Changes take only effect after restart.

phys_width.name: Physical width
phys_width.description: Physical width of projector screen in mm.

phys_height.name: Physical height
phys_height.description: Physical height of projector screen in mm.

endstop_idle_state.name: Endstop idle value
endstop_idle_state.description: Which value does the endstop GPIO pin have when the endstop is not triggered.

endstop_triggered_state.name: Endstop triggered value
endstop_triggered_state.description: Which value does the endstop GPIO pin have when the endstop is triggered.

z_max.name: Maximum Z height
z_max.description: Maximum length from 0mm Z axis to the endstop.

z_min_speed.name: Minimum Z speed
z_min_speed.description: The slowest posible travelspeed for Z axis in mm/s.

z_max_speed.name: Maximum Z speed
z_max_speed.description: The fastest posible travelspeed for Z axis in mm/s.

z_acceleration.name: Z axis acceleration
z_acceleration.description: Acceleration for Z axis in mm/sÂ².

z_steps.name: Z axis steps
z_steps.description: Steps per mm at the Z axis.

security.name: Userlogin enabaled
security.description: Enable/Disable login and block the webfrontend until a user has logged in.
